body.name: FUN LITTLE TOYS 148PCS Flower Garden Building Toys, Gardening Pretend Play Set, Educational Preschool Activity Kit Stem Toys Stacking Game for Girls Boys, Christmas Birthday Gift for Kids 3 4 5 6 7

byLineInfo.name: Visit the FUN LITTLE TOYS Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 34 mins
features: 【Upgraded Building Toys】 148 pcs garden set, including flowers, stamens, stems, leaves, butterflies, bases, various tools and a storage box. All made of non-toxic, child-friendly, high-quality materials that meet U.S. toy safety standards. Each piece has a smooth edge that will not hurt your child.

【Enhanced Creativity】 All parts included in this flower building toy set are interchangeable, so kids can use their imagination to combine beautiful butterflies, colorful flowers , stems and leaves freely to create their own unique garden!

【Educational STEM Gift】 The stacking toy set provides realistic early STEM support skills for children. Bright, colorful stem flower building toy set give children a basic understanding of color and help with hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.

【Easy to Clean and Store】 Equipped with a carrying case, easy to take to play outdoors. Don't worry about the toys getting dirty from playing in the grass or on the beach, all parts of the toys are washable!

【Best Gift for Kids】 This flower garden building set is the best toy for toddlers and also good for room decoration. Suitable for girls and boys ages 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 years old, the fun and educational design makes it an ideal gift for birthdays, parties, Christmas, New Year and summer camp activities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Each piece of this flower toy is made to be smooth, round and burr-free in order to protect delicate skin of kids.Every pieces can be washed, which is very hygienic for children. FUN LITTLE TOYS garden kids toy only for a more sustainable lifestyle.The flower garden building toy is made of friendly materials according to American Toy Safety Standards.Safe flower garden building toys, made from light but sturdy plastic that holds up to indoor and outdoor play. Let your kids create gorgeous bouquets and flower gardens with this fantastic art kit! 148 PCS brightly colored parts that keep little gardener engaged on planting her rainbow garden. The included bases allow young child to safely build confidence and balance while learning to stack.The bent and forked stalks that let them shape the flower stems as they wish. Beautiful butterfly, colorful flower and stem pieces can be infinitely combined naturally, unique floral design. What better way to introduce your little one to the joy of gardening! Build a garden is a wonderful activity for building a child holistically. Cultivate your child’s love and appreciation of nature, make her feel so proud and accomplished to show off “her garden”.Our building toys are the best toddler toys for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 year old girls and boys. All the designs make it a good gift for girls birthday, Easter, Christmas, New Year and summer camp activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a win! Great for hours of creativity. Love seeing how my child grow her garden. The only negative - there is no way all the pieces will ever go back in the cute little basket again. Basket should be bigger for garden storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute play flower garden
reviews.reviewText: Christmas gift for our granddaughter. Fun family entertainment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my three-year-old preschool class’ flower unit. I wasn’t sure if they would be able to figure it out, but they all loved it, even the boys! It’s been a favorite for weeks. They get very creative with the flowers and love the little butterflies too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my granddaughter. She loves it and I love that the individual pieces are not tiny. She enjoys making little flowers for everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice you get a lot to play with and make your own recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute playtime with kids
reviews.reviewText: I like this playset. It's a way to spend an afternoon with my kids building a play garden on our dining room table. The colors are vibrant and the materials are easy to handle and the end product is nothing short of adorable no matter how young your kids might be. My kids loved the time we spent playing with this garden toy set.However; the product page feels like it's overselling this product. Which it doesn't have to. This set is perfectly cute and easy to use for my 2yo and 5 yo. Some of the set seems like a very unusual design choice as well. There's a try that doesn't quite fit well into the box. It's made of cheap plastic and was already massively warped by the time we opened it. There's a rake, shovel, and watering can include which we did use to play pretend, but the kids were mostly interested in building the garden. The set also includes two baskets which can be used for home decor or something, but you need to use your own Play-Doh or sand to keep it up.I mention all of these extras because it's just such a pain to put them back into the box with all of the things in the garden. The kids won't be able to close the box after you've opened it. You're going to have to optimize every little piece of stem and flower petal in order to close this box. We're thinking about scrapping the box altogether and putting it all in a bigger box.We used the baskets to keep all the butterflies and some of the stems. The butterflies are vibrant but they are very difficult to attach to flowers.The kids do love this thing though. We'll probably have more Saturdays and family gatherings where we have the kids play with this. 148 pieces is a lot. Just..in case your goal is to keep a clean house. Just letting you know.
